name: TheGunRunner
description:
GamePlay: Find and retrieve all guns on each level to win.

Features:

• Levels: Play on city,snow, and desert levels.

• Guns: The goal is to retrieve all the guns on each level.

• Ammo: For every ammo box retrieved, 1min is added to the timer.

• Time: If you don't find all the guns before time runs out. Game over!

• Hard: A faced paced game with no save/load.
